data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Panzhihua, Sichuan, China and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Panzhihua, Sichuan, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Panzhihua, Sichuan, China need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.section_summary: On average, 34 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Panzhihua, Sichuan, China.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Lord, to the people of Panzhihua you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Panzhihua, Sichuan, China.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Popei people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, guide seekers in Panzhihua, Sichuan, China to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Panzhihua.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Panzhihua. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;
